text.name: info1
text.text: Kodi (formerly XBMC) is a free and open source media player application developed

text.name: info2
text.text: by the XBMC/Kodi Foundation, a non-profit technology consortium. Kodi is available for

text.name: info3
text.text: multiple operating-systems and hardware platforms, featuring a 10-foot user interface

text.name: info4
text.text: for use with televisions and remote controls.

text.name: info5
text.text: It allows users to play and view most videos, music, podcasts, and other digital media

text.name: info6
text.text: from local and network storage media and the internet.

text.name: info7
text.text: Kodi has a gigantic catalog of community add-ons available for you to customize

text.name: info8
text.text: and tweak your perfect entertainment setup.
